Description:
SKILLS/QUALIFICATIONS:  Bachelor’s Degree in engineering from a recognized university 
A minimum of 20 years’ experience in project management / interface leadership roles with proven track record for major and mega Oil & Gas and/or integrated Gasification projects 
Experienced in developing and leading effective project interface organizations 
Experienced in the implementation of industry best practices and Company's systems, processes, and standards 
Proven ability to apply sound judgment and analytical skills due to the complex and diversified nature of the position 
Extensive skills in management and leadership, team building, effective communication, conflict resolution and presentations 
Familiarity interacting with EPC contractors, follow-up on clearing punchlist items, and familiarity with punchlist tracking reporting systems (CoreWorx Reports, etc.) 
Culturally-sensitive and possesses outstanding communication & organizational skills, with the ability to interact with the Interface Managers and key stakeholders at Aramco & the EPC contractors. 
Previous experience in EPC brownfield projects in Arabian Gulf experience is preferable. 
Familiarity with Saudi Aramco standards preferred. 
Confident and mature.
Prior Interface Manager role in a PMC or client environment preferred.
Prior JV experience preferredJob Details
